ivardefs.name: action_
ivardefs.desc: Action taken as part of assessment procedure.

ivardefs.name: code
ivardefs.desc: Categorizes the type of clinical assessment performed.

ivardefs.name: context
ivardefs.desc: The encounter or episode of care this impression was created as part of.

ivardefs.name: date
ivardefs.desc: Indicates when the documentation of the assessment was complete.

ivardefs.name: description
ivardefs.desc: A summary of the context and/or cause of the assessment - why / where was it performed, and what patient events/status prompted it.

ivardefs.name: finding_
ivardefs.desc: Specific findings or diagnoses that was considered likely or relevant to ongoing treatment.

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: A unique identifier assigned to the clinical impression that remains consistent regardless of what server the impression is stored on.

ivardefs.name: investigation_
ivardefs.desc: One or more sets of investigations (signs, symptions, etc.). The actual grouping of investigations vary greatly depending on the type and context of the assessment. These investigations may include data generated during the assessment process, or data pre

ivardefs.name: note_
ivardefs.desc: Commentary about the impression, typically recorded after the impression itself was made, though supplemental notes by the original author could also appear.

ivardefs.name: previous
ivardefs.desc: A reference to the last assesment that was conducted bon this patient. Assessments are often/usually ongoing in nature; a care provider (practitioner or team) will make new assessments on an ongoing basis as new data arises or the patient's conditions cha

ivardefs.name: problem_
ivardefs.desc: This a list of the relevant problems/conditions for a patient.

ivardefs.name: protocol_
ivardefs.desc: Reference to a specific published clinical protocol that was followed during this assessment, and/or that provides evidence in support of the diagnosis.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: Identifies the workflow status of the assessment.

ivardefs.name: subject
ivardefs.desc: The patient or group of individuals assessed as part of this record.

ivardefs.name: summary
ivardefs.desc: A text summary of the investigations and the diagnosis.
